name: pdf-toolkit
display_name: PDF Tools - Analyze, Extract, Fill, Compare
description: Let Claude work with PDFs on your computer: read, analyze, fill forms, extract data
long_description:
Powerful PDF analysis toolkit for Claude Desktop.

**What Claude can do with your PDFs:**
• Analyze lengthy research papers and academic documents
• Extract data from technical documentation
• Compare multiple contract versions
• Fill out forms automatically
• Summarize complex reports

**Works with any PDF type:** Scientific papers, legal contracts, technical manuals, financial statements, invoices, and forms (W-9, 1099, I-9). Handles fillable forms, scanned documents, and encrypted PDFs.

**Key features:**
• Work with PDFs already on your computer without uploading
• Extract tables and structured data to CSV
• Bulk process hundreds of documents
• Handle password-protected files
• Save reusable profiles for common forms

**Perfect for:** Researchers analyzing literature, lawyers comparing contracts, engineers reviewing specifications, and businesses processing invoices. Claude excels at maintaining context across 300+ page documents.

tools.name: list_pdfs
tools.description: List all PDF files in a directory

tools.name: read_pdf_fields
tools.description: Read all form fields from a PDF file

tools.name: fill_pdf
tools.description: Fill a PDF form with provided data and save it

tools.name: bulk_fill_from_csv
tools.description: Fill multiple PDFs using data from a CSV file

tools.name: save_profile
tools.description: Save form data as a reusable profile

tools.name: fill_with_profile
tools.description: Fill a PDF using a saved profile

tools.name: extract_to_csv
tools.description: Extract form data from filled PDFs to a CSV file

tools.name: validate_pdf
tools.description: Validate if all required fields in a PDF are filled

tools.name: read_pdf_content
tools.description: Read and analyze the full content of a PDF file - extract text, summarize, convert to other formats, or answer questions about the document

tools.name: get_pdf_resource_uri
tools.description: Get a resource URI for a PDF file that can be used with Claude's built-in PDF reading capabilities via the Resources API

prompts.name: research_paper_analysis
prompts.text: I'll analyze your research paper or academic document, focusing on ${arguments.focus_area}. I can extract key findings and methodology, identify research gaps, create chapter-by-chapter summaries, pull out all citations, and generate a literature review outline.

prompts.name: contract_comparison
prompts.text: I'll compare multiple contracts or legal documents, focusing on ${arguments.comparison_focus}. I'll highlight changed clauses, modified terms, added/removed sections, pricing differences, liability changes, and create a comparison summary.

prompts.name: financial_report_extraction
prompts.text: I'll extract and analyze data from your financial PDFs including all tables and key metrics. I'll convert the data to ${arguments.output_format} format for analysis, with specific page references for all extracted information.

prompts.name: document_qa_session
prompts.text: Let's discuss your PDF document. Starting with: ${arguments.initial_question}. I can find specific information, explain complex sections, cross-reference different parts, extract quotes with page numbers, and answer 'what if' scenarios.

prompts.name: bulk_invoice_processing
prompts.description: Process multiple invoices into structured data
prompts.text: I'll process all invoice PDFs in ${arguments.folder_path} and create a unified dataset in ${arguments.output_format} format. I'll extract vendor names, invoice numbers, dates, line items, totals, tax amounts, and payment terms.

prompts.name: technical_documentation_summary
prompts.text: I'll analyze your technical documentation and create ${arguments.summary_type}. I'll extract code examples, create reference guides, identify implementation steps, and summarize troubleshooting sections.

prompts.name: fill_w9_business
prompts.text: I'll help fill the W-9 for your business. I need: Business legal name, DBA/trade name (if different), business type (LLC/Corp/Partnership), tax classification, EIN, and business address. I'll properly check the correct tax classification boxes and ensure the form meets IRS requirements.

prompts.name: batch_invoices
prompts.text: I'll help you batch process invoices. Point me to the folder containing your invoice PDFs. I can: extract all amounts and dates, create a summary spreadsheet, identify missing information, calculate totals by vendor/date/category. What specific data do you need extracted?

prompts.name: rental_application
prompts.text: I'll help complete rental applications. Have ready: personal info, employment history (3 years), income verification, previous addresses (3 years), references, vehicle info, and emergency contact. I'll ensure all required fields are filled and flag any that need supporting documents.

prompts.name: extract_1099_data
prompts.text: I'll extract all data from your 1099 forms (1099-NEC, 1099-MISC, 1099-DIV, 1099-INT, etc.) and create a tax summary. I'll organize by payer, identify the type of income, sum totals by category, and format it for easy import into tax software.
